Take that Cracka!

Similar posts Apr 04

We had a little get together today for Joe Causey at Brunet's. Joe will be leaving us this week to go do freelance work in Nashville and work with some pretty neat people.

If you have met Joe you know that he will be missed greatly at HPC. He's a great guy. Even though he's going to be working with rockstars he still made time to come have lunch with the little people. He even brought along his Barbie laptop to show us.
